name: unblock
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to clear something by removing something that is blocking it: to unblock a pipe/drain/toilet He's having an operation to unblock two of his arteries.
to make it possible to use a phone, website, etc. again: Learn how you can unblock a phone number or remove it from the Auto Reject List.
